taskDescription: Assume that you are carrying out the base-induced dehydrobromination of 3-bromo-3-methylpentane (Section 11.7) to yield an alkene. How could you use IR spectroscopy to tell which of three possible elimination products is formed, if one includes E/Z isomers?
